if u want to play this game... 

1st >>> find the "avd-pb.r00" in prison break game folder

2nd>>> there are two files inside of the "avd-pb.r00",,Prisonbreak.MDF,,and prisonbreak.MDS,,

3rd>>> extract the PrisonBreak.MDF and PrisonBreak.MDS  in the desktop,

4th>>> Right click the small icon of DAEMON tool lite >>> "Vertual Devices" >>> Then "Device0:" And choose the PrisonBreak.MDS,,, not PrisonBreak.MDF,, its PrisonBreak.MDS

5th>>> After clicking the PrisonBreak.MDS with using DAEMON tool... the installer will pop in the monitor screen..or u can go in "My Computer">>> and the installer disc..

THATS THE WAY TO INSTALL THE GAME
